lead_paragraph: READ--Donald Bartow, 86, of Old Lyme, died Tuesday, May 31, 2016 at home. Mr. Read was born on December 11, 1929 in Boston, MA, the seventh son of William Augustus and Edith Fabyan Read. He attended St. Paul's School and received his BA in Art History from Trinity College in Hartford, CT, where he was a member of the St. Anthony Hall. He married Jean (Beasley) in 1954. After a career in the financial industry in Hartford and New York City, he pursued his love of the sea in a position of rigger at a sailmaker in Stamford, CT. His passion for art and fabrication expressed itself in a collection of metal and wood sculptures which can be seen in private collections. After 17 years, he retired and moved to Old Lyme to sail frequently on the Maine coast. Mr. Read is survived by his wife Jean, his two sons R. Bartow Read of Appleton, ME and Mark E. Read of Carmel, CA, four grandchildren and one great-grandchild. He was predeceased by his son J. Miles Read. No services are planned by his request. 1/3
